titleStmt.title: The new arival of the three gracis, into Anglia Lamenting the abusis of this present age.
titleStmt.author: Batman, Stephen, d. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas East, for VVilliam Norton, and Stephen Bateman,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Running title reads: The late ariuall, of the three gracis.
Imperfect; bottom margin cropped, affecting signatures.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
